author: Woodtastic
content:
I was at the door as they opened so I was the first customer.
I went for the fish curry, lamb and spinach and keema with rice, a roti and a glass of mango lassi.
As always the food was fantastic,  think the total price was Â£10.20, which is a bargain.
This and Thats remains in my top 3 curry houses.
